title: Andrey, Senior ROR Developer
summary:
2+ years of software development experience,

 Web-applications development (Ruby on Rails) 

 Rich front-end development ( Bootstrap, CoffeeScript, Angular, Vue, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery) 

 Experience with databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) 

 Experience with tools and methodologies (TDD, BDD, SCRUM, Kanban, JIRA, Asana, Git/Github/BitBucket, Heroku, etc).
education:
2009-2014 Belarusian National Technical University, 

 INFORMATION TECHNOLOGIES AND ROBOTICS FACULTY.

projects.name: Assessment Gathering Platform
projects.description:
The goal is to create psychometric software that gathers survey data and 
 analyzes it with extremely complex and customizable scoring methodologies.
projects.technologies: Ruby, JavaScript, React, Redux, Ruby on Rails 5, PostgreSQL, Redis, Capistrano, Nginx/Passenger, ActionCable, WebSocket.

projects.name: Social platform for photographers
projects.description: The goal is to create platform for photographer where they can sell their pictures.
projects.technologies: Ruby, JavaScript, React, Redux, Graphql, Ruby on Rails 5, PostgreSQL, Redis, Capistrano, Nginx/Passenger

projects.name: E-commerce app for renting boats
projects.description: The goal is to create platform that will allow users to rent boats in South America.
projects.technologies: Ruby, JavaScript, React, Redux, Graphql, Ruby on Rails 5, PostgreSQL, Redis, Capistrano, Nginx/Passenger

projects.name: Social platform for US University Alumni
projects.description: The goal is to create mobiles applications for university graduates. Platform will allow graduates to take part in different quizzes, search friends and have chat with them.
projects.technologies: Ruby, JavaScript, Vue, Ruby on Rails 5, PostgreSQL, Redis, Capistrano, Ubuntu Server 16.04, Nginx/Passenger, ActionCable, WebSocket.

projects.name: E-Sports platform
projects.description: The goal is to create a web platform for eSports gamers. Platform will serve as an aggregator for gamers who are inspired to play competitive to raise the bar of their skill by betting money on the matches
projects.technologies: Ruby, JavaScript, Ruby on Rails 5, PostgreSQL, Redis, Capistrano, Ubuntu Server 16.04, Nginx/Passenger.

projects.name: Intelligent exercise system (IoT)
projects.description: Application tracks signals from machine sensors (IoT). Sensors send information about different indicators. App monitor user performance and provide feedback to ensure correct exercise motion is performed by the user during exercise.
projects.technologies: Ruby, JavaScript, Ruby on Rails 4.2, PostgreSQL, Capistrano, Redis, Elastic search engine.
